sqlMap.sql:
SELECT B.* , C.PROCESS_NM , NVL(B.REQ_USR_NM, SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_EXIST_USR_NM FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.REQ_ID , A.REQ_ORD , A.REQ_CLS_ID , NVL(SF_REQ4000_REQ_CLS_NM(A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_CLS_ID, '2'), '') AS REQ_CLS_NM , A.REQ_NO , A.REQ_USR_ID , NVL(A.REQ_USR_NM, SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_USR_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DTM , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , A.REQ_USR_EMAIL , A.REQ_USR_NUM , A.REQ_NM , REGEXP_REPLACE (A.REQ_DESC ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , ' ' ) AS REQ_DESC , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID , A.REQ_COMPLETE_RATIO , A.REQ_FP , A.REQ_EX_FP , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DU_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DU_DTM , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_NEW_TYPE , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00009', A.REQ_NEW_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_ACCEPT_TXT , A.SCL_CD , A.REQ_TYPE_CD , A.PIA_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00011', A.SCL_CD, '1') AS SCL_NM , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00012', A.REQ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REQ_TYPE_NM , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.PIA_CD, '1') AS PIA_NM , A.LAB_INP , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.CB_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.MILESTONE_ID , A.PROCESS_ID , A.FLOW_ID , A.USE_CD , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , A.REQ_MIDDLE_DONE_TXT , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , A.ORG_REQ_ID , A.REQ_KEY , Z.USR_NM AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)) AS REQ_ED_NOW_DTM , TRUNC((NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0))- A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM)) AS CALC_REQ_DAY FROM REQ4100 A, ADM2000 Z WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_CHARGER_ID = Z.USR_ID(+) AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,SYSDATE),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '01' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '01' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '05' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '06' ) B, FLW1000 C WHERE 1=1 AND B.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND B.PROCESS_ID = C.PROCESS_ID AND B.CALC_REQ_DAY > 0 AND C.PROCESS_NM = #processNm# ORDER BY B.PROCESS_ID, B.CALC_REQ_DAY DESC
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM , A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.START_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , A.ORD , A.PRJ_DESC , A.USE_CD , A.PRJ_TYPE , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00013', A.PRJ_TYPE, '1') AS PRJ_TYPE_NM , A.PRJ_GRP_CD , NVL(B.PRJ_DO_REQ_CNT,0) AS PRJ_DO_REQ_CNT , NVL(B.PRJ_DONE_REQ_CNT,0) AS PRJ_DONE_REQ_CNT , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ1000 A, ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID, COUNT(DECODE(Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE,'01',1,'02',1,'03',1)) AS PRJ_DO_REQ_CNT, COUNT(DECODE(Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE,'04',1)) AS PRJ_DONE_REQ_CNT FROM REQ4100 Z, FLW1100 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = Y.PRJ_ID AND Z.PROCESS_ID = Y.PROCESS_ID AND Z.FLOW_ID = Y.FLOW_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# GROUP BY Z.PRJ_ID ) B WHERE A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID(+) ORDER BY A.ORD ASC

SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, A.PROCESS_NM ,A.PROCESS_DESC ,A.PROCESS_CONFIRM_CD ,A.USE_CD ,NVL(B.PRO_DO_REQ_CNT,0) AS PRO_DO_REQ_CNT ,NVL(B.PRO_DONE_REQ_CNT,0) AS PRO_DONE_REQ_CNT ,NVL(B.PRO_TOTAL_REQ_CNT,0) AS PRO_TOTAL_REQ_CNT ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP ,TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM FLW1000 A, ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID ,Z.PROCESS_ID , COUNT(DECODE(Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE,'01',1,'02',1,'03',1)) AS PRO_DO_REQ_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE,'04',1)) AS PRO_DONE_REQ_CNT , COUNT(*) AS PRO_TOTAL_REQ_CNT FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# GROUP BY Z.PRJ_ID,Z.PROCESS_ID ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_CONFIRM_CD = '02' AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID(+) AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID(+)
AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
ORDER BY A.PROCESS_ORD, A.REG_DTM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM (
) T ) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT B.DOC_NM , B.PRJ_ID , B.DOC_ID , B.UPPER_DOC_ID , SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(C.LIC_GRP_ID, B.PRJ_ID, B.DOC_ID, '2') AS UP_DOC_NM , SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(C.LIC_GRP_ID, B.PRJ_ID, B.DOC_ID, '3') AS UPUP_DOC_NM , B.LVL , B.ORD , B.DOC_DESC , B.DOC_FORM_FILE_ID , B.DOC_FORM_FILE_SN , B.DOC_ATCH_FILE_ID , B.DOC_FILE_SN , TO_CHAR(B.DOC_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOC_ED_DTM , B.USE_CD , B.DOC_CALC_ED_DAY , B.DOC_TOTAL_CNT , B.DOC_NULL_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.*, TRUNC((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) - NVL(A.DOC_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0))) AS DOC_CALC_ED_DAY ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM PRJ3000 B WHERE 1=1 AND B.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID) AS DOC_TOTAL_CNT ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM PRJ3000 C WHERE 1=1 AND C.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND C.DOC_ED_DTM IS NULL) AS DOC_NULL_CNT FROM PRJ3000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND (A.DOC_FILE_SN = 0 OR A.DOC_FILE_SN IS NULL) --AND A.DOC_ED_DTM IS NOT NULL ) B, PRJ1000 C WHERE 1=1 AND B.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND B.DOC_CALC_ED_DAY > 0
